verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be thou <S%H2865>dismayed:<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and his land: <S%H776><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and her <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> unto <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and her <S%H4428>king:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> thereof, shall ye take for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto yourselves: <S%H7760>lay<s%> thee an <S%H693>ambush<s%> for the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> it.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> chose <S%H977>out<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> shall lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> against the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> <S%H7368>go<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> far <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> but <S%H1961>be<s%> ye <S%H3605>all<s%> ready: <S%H3559><s%>

And <S%H589>I,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H854>with<s%> me, will <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us, <S%H834>as<s%> at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> that we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them,

(For they will come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> us) <S%H5704>till<s%> we have <S%H5423>drawn<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they will <S%H559>say,<s%> They <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, <S%H834>as<s%> at the <S%H7223>first:<s%> therefore we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

Then <S%H859>ye<s%> shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> from the <S%H4480>ambush,<s%> <S%H693><s%> and seize <S%H3423>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when ye have <S%H8610>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that ye shall <S%H3341>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire:<s%> according to the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do.<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore sent them <S%H7971>forth:<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> lie in <S%H3993>ambush,<s%> and <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the west <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H3220><s%> of <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> but <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even the people of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and drew <S%H5066>nigh,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the north <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6828><s%> of <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> now there was a <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them and <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> about <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them to lie in <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the west <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H3220><s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And when they had <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was on the <S%H4480>north<s%> <S%H6828><s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and their liers in <S%H6119>wait<s%> on the <S%H4480>west<s%> <S%H3220><s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, that they <S%H4116>hasted<s%> and rose up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> at a time <S%H4150>appointed,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6160>plain;<s%> but <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there were liers in <S%H693>ambush<s%> against him <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made as if they were <S%H5060>beaten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in <S%H5857>Ai<s%> were called <S%H2199>together<s%> to <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them: and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and were drawn <S%H5423>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And there was <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H5857>Ai<s%> or <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> went not <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and they <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>spear<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%> And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>spear<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> out of their <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> and they <S%H7323>ran<s%> as soon as he had stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H4116>hasted<s%> and <S%H3341>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And when the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them, they <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and they <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3027>power<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> this <S%H2008>way<s%> or that <S%H2008>way:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> turned <S%H2015>back<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers.<s%>

And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H693>ambush<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>ascended,<s%> then they turned <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And the <S%H428>other<s%> issued <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> them; so they <S%H1961>were<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H428>some<s%> on this <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and <S%H428>some<s%> on that <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, <S%H5704>so<s%> that they let <S%H1115>none<s%> of them <S%H7604>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape.<s%>
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> they <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2026>slaying<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they <S%H7291>chased<s%> them, and when they were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And so it <S%H1961>was,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> both of <S%H4480>men<s%> <S%H376><s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

For <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>drew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> back, <S%H834>wherewith<s%> he stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>spear,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> he had utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto themselves, according unto the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H8510>heap<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> even a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6256>eventide:<s%> <S%H6153><s%> and as soon as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H935>down,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that they should take his carcass <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5038><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones,<s%> that remaineth <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%>

As <S%H834><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> man hath lifted <S%H5130>up<s%> any <S%H1270>iron:<s%> and they <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and their <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H2088><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and on that <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as well the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> as he that was born among <S%H249>them;<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7223>before,<s%> that they should <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> and <S%H7045>cursings,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

There <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that were <S%H1980>conversant<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them.
